meanings.definition: A person who rents a property from a tenant.
meanings.sent1: The undertenants in the building were friendly neighbors.
meanings.sent2: The undertenants paid their rent on time each month.
meanings.sent3: The undertenants organized a fun community event.
meanings.sent4: The undertenants were like puzzle pieces fitting perfectly in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The undertenants added a vibrant energy to the apartment complex.

meanings.definition: To rent a property from a tenant.
meanings.sent1: She undertenants a cozy apartment near the park.
meanings.sent2: They undertenants the house while saving up to buy their own.
meanings.sent3: He undertenants a spacious office for his growing business.
meanings.sent4: The family undertenants a charming cottage for the summer.
meanings.sent5: We undertenants a beautiful beach house for our vacation.
